wednesday.title: Weekly Update - November 2025
wednesday.description: 'A mentor is someone who allows you to see the hope inside yourself.' - Oprah Winfrey. This quote beautifully captures how mentorship nurtures emotional wellness by helping individuals recognize their inner strength and potential.

wednesday.title: Weekly Update - November 2025
wednesday.description: 'Mentoring is a brain to pick, an ear to listen, and a push in the right direction.' - John C. Crosby. This quote emphasizes the holistic support mentors offer - intellectual, emotional, and motivational - contributing to both personal growth and empowerment.

wednesday.title: Weekly Update - November 2025
wednesday.description: 'Show me a successful individual and I will show you someone who had real positive influences in their life. I don't care what you do for a living - if you do it well I'm sure there was someone cheering you on or showing the way. A mentor.' - Denzel Washington.

wednesday.title: Weekly Update - November 2025
wednesday.description: 'Mentorship is not just about guiding others, - its about lighting the path so they can walk it with confidence.' - Unknown. A reminder that empowerment comes not from control, but from enabling others to independently.

monday.title: Weekly Update - November 2025
monday.description: Jita it's important to keep in mind that mentorship is a gift - it's about giving time, wisdom, and encouragement to shape someone's journey.

monday.title: Weekly Update - November 2025
monday.description: Effective mentors engage mentees effectively, fostering deeper learning and growth. Hence it is critical to ensure that those who we mentor are active participants in their mentorship journey.

monday.title: Weekly Update - November 2025
monday.description: Jita, lets advocate for mentorship being about helping others recognize and harness their own strengths.

monday.title: Weekly Update - November 2025
monday.description: in essence jita, mentorship is a powerful way to leave a lasting legacy through the lives you influence.
